creator: MC_LANG
descriptionHtml:
Knots 360 Free (Demo) shows you 22 knot in 3D perspective. Animated with your fingers, 360 degree animation.

Knots 360 Free version is used to test for the Knots 360 Pro version.

Characteristics:
- 22 knots with 3D animation (161 knots Pro-Version)
- Language: German, English, French ,Italian, Spanish, Swedish, Russian, Turkish(other languages in planning)
- Knot inormationen
- Subdivision into knot categories
- Installable to SD Card.
- Display size> = 6 '' also in landscape format

Features:
- Animation of the knot, tie or throw.
- Speed infinitely adjustable
- With the finger, the knot can be rotated, zoomed and animated
- Start and stop the animation
- Single picture mode
- 360 degree view

Permissions:
- no permissions required
- no internet connection required

Knots:
• Albright Special
• Alpine Butterfly
• Anchor Bend (with two half hitches)
• Arbor Knot
• Ashley's Bend
• Ashley's Stopper Knot
• Backhand Hitch
• Barrel Hitch (1)
• Barrel Hitch (2)
• Blake's Hitch
• Blood Knot
• Bowline on a Bight
• Bowline
• Buntline Hitch
• Carrick Bend
• Cat's Paw
• Celtic Button Knot
• Centauri Knot
• Cleat Hitch
• Clove Hitch (Tied)
• Clove Hitch (thrown)
• Common Whipping
